scripts.start:server:cra: cd ../../examples/create-react-app && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start:server:nextjs-auth0: cd ../../examples/nextjs/nextjs-auth0 && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start:server:auth0-react: cd ../../examples/nextjs/auth0-react && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.test:nextjs-auth0:browser: CYPRESS_AUTH0_SDK=nextjs_auth0 start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:nextjs-auth0' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:browser
scripts.test:nextjs-auth0:headless: CYPRESS_AUTH0_SDK=nextjs_auth0 start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:nextjs-auth0' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:run
scripts.test:auth0-react:browser: CYPRESS_AUTH0_SDK=auth0_react start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:cra' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:browser
scripts.test:auth0-react:headless: CYPRESS_AUTH0_SDK=auth0_react start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:cra' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:run
scripts.test:cra:browser: CYPRESS_AUTH0_SDK=auth0_react start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:cra' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:browser
scripts.test:cra:headless: CYPRESS_AUTH0_SDK=auth0_react start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:cra' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:run
scripts.test: npm run test:auth0-react:headless && npm run test:nextjs-auth0:headless && npm run test:cra:headless
